purpose.title: Purpose and Scope
purpose.point1: This Pricing and Commission Policy (the “Policy”) defines the principles, structure, and applicable commission rates for sellers offering products through the Reli.one marketplace (the “Platform”).
purpose.point2: The Policy applies to all sellers registered on the Platform, unless explicitly agreed otherwise in an individual written agreement.
purpose.point3: The purpose of this Policy is to ensure transparency, predictability, and fairness in the calculation of marketplace commissions.

generalPrinciples.title: General Principles
generalPrinciples.intro: Reli.one applies a fixed commission rate per main product category.

rates.item1: are flat within each main category,
rates.item2: do not depend on subcategories, product type, brand, or price tiers,
rates.item3: are charged only upon successful completion of a transaction.

generalPrinciples.subcategoriesNote: and do not affect the applicable commission rate.

caps.title: Caps and Special Conditions
caps.point1: Reli.one may apply a maximum commission cap per order for selected categories or transactions.
caps.text: Where applicable, such caps will be communicated transparently in the Seller Panel or individual agreements.
caps.point2: Any preferential rates, promotional discounts, or individual commercial terms apply only if expressly agreed in writing and do not amend this Policy for other sellers.

changes.title: Changes to the Policy
changes.intro: Reli.one reserves the right to amend this Policy in order to:

reasons.item3: respond to regulatory or market developments.

changes.note: Any changes will be published on the Platform and shall become effective on the date indicated therein.

transparency.title: Transparency and Fair Dealing
transparency.point1: Reli.one is committed to maintaining a simple and transparent fee structure.
transparency.point2: Unlike marketplaces that apply complex tiered or subcategory-based pricing, Reli.one ensures that sellers are able to clearly determine their commission rate in advance, without hidden conditions.
